tasks.title: Setup Godot Project Environment
tasks.description: Initialize the Godot project with the specified tech stack.
tasks.details: Create a new Godot project using Godot 4.5. Set up the project to use C# as the scripting language. Integrate the Godot Control UI framework and configure the Godot Theme/Skin for styling. Ensure the Godot Export Templates are ready for build and deployment.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the project builds successfully and the UI framework is correctly integrated by creating a simple UI component.

tasks.title: Implement Event Engine Core
tasks.description: Develop the core functionalities of the Event Engine.
tasks.details: Create the EventEngine class in C#. Implement methods for processing game cycles, evaluating event conditions, executing event effects, and resolving conflicts. Use Godot signals for event-driven communication.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit test each method to ensure correct event processing and conflict resolution. Use mock events to simulate game cycles.

subtasks.title: Create EventEngine Class in C#
subtasks.description: Develop the foundational EventEngine class in C# for the event engine core.
subtasks.details: Define the EventEngine class structure, including necessary properties and fields. Ensure compatibility with Godot signals for event-driven communication.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify class instantiation and signal connections.

subtasks.title: Implement Game Cycle Processing Method
subtasks.description: Develop the method to process game cycles within the EventEngine class.
subtasks.details: Create a method to handle game cycle updates, integrating with Godot signals to trigger events. Ensure efficient cycle management.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit test with mock game cycles to ensure correct processing.

subtasks.title: Develop Event Condition Evaluation Method
subtasks.description: Implement the method to evaluate event conditions in the EventEngine class.
subtasks.details: Design a method to assess event conditions, using logical checks and state evaluations. Integrate with existing game state data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with various event conditions to ensure accurate evaluations.

subtasks.title: Set Up Unit Tests for Event Engine Core
subtasks.description: Establish unit tests for the EventEngine class and its methods.
subtasks.details: Create unit tests for each method in the EventEngine class, focusing on game cycle processing, event condition evaluation, and event execution.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use a testing framework to automate and validate test cases, ensuring comprehensive coverage.

tasks.title: Develop AI Coordinator System
tasks.description: Build the AI Coordinator to manage AI behaviors and interactions.
tasks.details: Create the AICoordinator class in C#. Implement AI cycle processing, conflict resolution, relationship network updates, and AI event generation. Utilize a dedicated ThreadPool for AI computations.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate AI interactions and verify correct behavior and conflict resolution. Measure performance to ensure efficient processing.

subtasks.title: Implement AI Cycle Processing
subtasks.description: Develop the AI cycle processing logic within the AICoordinator class.
subtasks.details: Create methods to handle AI decision-making and state updates. Ensure efficient processing using C# and optimize for performance.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate AI cycles and verify correct state transitions.

subtasks.title: Develop Conflict Resolution Mechanism
subtasks.description: Create a system to resolve conflicts between AI entities.
subtasks.details: Implement algorithms to detect and resolve conflicts. Use priority rules and negotiation strategies to manage AI interactions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test conflict scenarios and ensure resolution logic is applied correctly.

subtasks.title: Optimize AI Performance with ThreadPool
subtasks.description: Utilize ThreadPool to enhance AI computation efficiency.
subtasks.details: Integrate a dedicated ThreadPool for parallel processing of AI tasks. Ensure thread safety and manage resource allocation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Measure performance improvements and verify thread safety.

subtasks.title: Integrate Relationship Network Updates
subtasks.description: Update AI relationship networks based on interactions.
subtasks.details: Develop methods to adjust relationship parameters dynamically. Ensure updates are consistent with AI interactions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate interactions and verify relationship network updates.

subtasks.title: Generate AI Events
subtasks.description: Implement AI event generation within the AICoordinator.
subtasks.details: Create a system to generate events based on AI actions and interactions. Ensure events are logged and processed correctly.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test event generation and logging under various AI scenarios.

tasks.title: Integrate Local Data Storage with SQLite
tasks.description: Set up local data storage using godot-sqlite for game data.
tasks.details: Integrate the godot-sqlite plugin into the project. Configure the database in WAL mode for high concurrency. Implement data models for events, game state, AI personalities, and user preferences.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform CRUD operations on the database and verify data integrity and performance under load.

tasks.title: Implement Config and Save/Load System
tasks.description: Develop the system for configuration and game state management.
tasks.details: Use Godot's ConfigFile to manage user configurations and save game states. Implement save/load functionality ensuring data integrity and recovery options.
tasks.testStrategy: Test saving and loading game states under various scenarios. Verify data consistency and recovery from simulated corruption.

tasks.title: Setup Performance Optimization Features
tasks.description: Implement performance optimization mechanisms as specified.
tasks.details: Implement a dedicated ThreadPool for AI, configure SQLite in WAL mode, and set up an LRU Memory Cache. Develop a Priority Queue System for event handling.
tasks.testStrategy: Benchmark performance metrics such as startup time, memory usage, and response times. Optimize based on results.

subtasks.title: Implement Dedicated ThreadPool for AI
subtasks.description: Develop a dedicated ThreadPool to optimize AI processing.
subtasks.details: Create a ThreadPool class in C# to manage AI tasks efficiently. Ensure thread safety and optimal resource allocation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Benchmark AI task processing times and resource usage.

subtasks.title: Configure SQLite in WAL Mode
subtasks.description: Set up SQLite to use Write-Ahead Logging (WAL) mode for improved performance.
subtasks.details: Modify SQLite configuration to enable WAL mode. Ensure compatibility with existing database operations.
subtasks.testStrategy: Measure database read/write speeds before and after enabling WAL mode.

subtasks.title: Develop Priority Queue System for Event Handling
subtasks.description: Create a Priority Queue System to manage event handling efficiently.
subtasks.details: Implement a priority queue using C# to handle events based on priority levels. Integrate with the existing event engine.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test event processing order and efficiency under various load conditions.

subtasks.title: Set Up LRU Memory Cache
subtasks.description: Implement an LRU (Least Recently Used) Memory Cache to optimize memory usage.
subtasks.details: Develop an LRU cache system in C# to store frequently accessed data. Ensure it integrates seamlessly with existing systems.
subtasks.testStrategy: Evaluate cache hit/miss ratios and memory usage efficiency.

tasks.title: Integrate Static Code Analysis and Error Monitoring
tasks.description: Set up SonarQube for code analysis and Sentry for error monitoring.
tasks.details: Integrate SonarQube into the development workflow for continuous code quality checks. Set up Sentry for runtime error monitoring and release health tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Run static analysis on the codebase and verify error monitoring by simulating runtime errors.

tasks.title: Design and Implement Modular Plugin System
tasks.description: Create a plugin system to support modular extensions.
tasks.details: Develop interfaces for event, UI, AI behavior, and data source plugins. Implement hooks for event triggers, execution, and custom conditions.
tasks.testStrategy: Develop sample plugins and test their integration and functionality within the system.

tasks.title: Develop User Privacy and Data Security Features
tasks.description: Implement features to ensure data security and user privacy.
tasks.details: Implement auto-backup, schema validation, data integrity checks, and recovery options. Ensure all data is stored locally with optional telemetry requiring user consent.
tasks.testStrategy: Test backup and recovery processes. Verify data integrity and privacy compliance through audits.

tasks.title: Prepare for Future DLC and Expansion Support
tasks.description: Design the system to support future DLCs and expansions.
tasks.details: Reserve interfaces and extension points for future DLCs. Ensure modular loading and backward compatibility in data formats.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate DLC loading and unloading. Verify system stability and compatibility with existing data.

tasks.title: Setup Core Game Loop
tasks.description: Implement the core game loop for Guild Manager using a turn-based system.
tasks.details: Implement the GameTurnSystem interface with methods for executing the resolution, player, and AI phases. Ensure each phase updates the game state appropriately.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit test each phase to ensure correct state transitions and data updates.

tasks.title: Develop Event System
tasks.description: Create a scalable event system to handle game events.
tasks.details: Implement the EventDefinition interface to manage event categories, triggers, and outcomes. Ensure the system can handle at least 1000 events initially.
tasks.testStrategy: Test event triggering and resolution under various conditions to ensure robustness.

tasks.title: Implement AI Ecosystem
tasks.description: Develop a multi-layered AI system for NPC guilds and members.
tasks.details: Create the AIEcosystem class with member, NPC guild, and environment AI layers. Implement autonomous decision-making and relationship dynamics.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate AI behavior in different scenarios to validate decision-making and interactions.

subtasks.title: Develop Member AI Layer
subtasks.description: Create the AI layer for individual guild members.
subtasks.details: Implement the MemberAI class to handle individual decision-making and actions within the guild.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate member actions in various scenarios to ensure correct behavior.

subtasks.title: Develop NPC Guild AI Layer
subtasks.description: Create the AI layer for NPC guilds.
subtasks.details: Implement the NPCGuildAI class to manage guild-level strategies and interactions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test guild strategies in simulated environments to validate decision-making.

subtasks.title: Develop Environment AI Layer
subtasks.description: Create the AI layer for the environment.
subtasks.details: Implement the EnvironmentAI class to simulate environmental interactions and influences on guilds and members.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate environmental changes and observe AI responses to ensure realistic interactions.

subtasks.title: Implement Autonomous Decision-Making Logic
subtasks.description: Develop the logic for autonomous decision-making across AI layers.
subtasks.details: Create algorithms that enable AI entities to make independent decisions based on their objectives and environment.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run decision-making scenarios to ensure AI entities make optimal choices.

subtasks.title: Implement Relationship Dynamics
subtasks.description: Develop the system for managing relationship dynamics between AI entities.
subtasks.details: Create a relationship management system to handle interactions and dynamics between members and guilds.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test relationship changes and dynamics in various scenarios to ensure realistic interactions.

tasks.title: Design Guild Management Module
tasks.description: Build the guild management interface and functionalities.
tasks.details: Implement the WorkPanel interface to provide real-time updates on guild status, finances, and member activities. Integrate with the event system for notifications.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct UI/UX testing to ensure information is displayed accurately and intuitively.

tasks.title: Create Tactical Center Module
tasks.description: Develop the tactical center for managing raid and PVP compositions.
tasks.details: Implement the TacticalCenter interface with systems for managing raid and PVP compositions, including AI auto-assignment and validation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test composition creation and validation processes to ensure correct role assignments and balance.

tasks.title: Develop PVE System
tasks.description: Implement the PVE system with raid dungeons and boss encounters.
tasks.details: Create the RaidDungeon and Encounter interfaces to define raid structures and boss mechanics. Implement combat simulation for encounter results.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate raid encounters to test mechanics, difficulty scaling, and reward distribution.

tasks.title: Implement PVP System
tasks.description: Develop the PVP system for battlegrounds and arenas.
tasks.details: Create the PVPCompositionManager to handle PVP team compositions and manage battles. Integrate with the tactical center for strategy management.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct PVP simulations to ensure team dynamics and strategy effectiveness.

subtasks.title: Develop PVPCompositionManager
subtasks.description: Create the PVPCompositionManager to handle team compositions.
subtasks.details: Implement a class to manage PVP team compositions, including methods for adding, removing, and updating team members.
subtasks.testStrategy: Write unit tests to verify team composition changes.

subtasks.title: Implement Battle Simulation System
subtasks.description: Develop a system to simulate PVP battles.
subtasks.details: Create a simulation engine to model PVP battles, including combat mechanics and outcome prediction.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct simulations to validate battle outcomes and mechanics.

subtasks.title: Integrate Strategy Management with Tactical Center
subtasks.description: Integrate PVP strategies with the tactical center.
subtasks.details: Develop interfaces to connect PVP strategies with the tactical center for dynamic strategy adjustments.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test integration with tactical center to ensure strategy updates are applied correctly.

tasks.title: Build Member Management Module
tasks.description: Create a system for managing guild members and their attributes.
tasks.details: Implement the GuildMember interface to manage member attributes, roles, and relationships. Integrate with the AI system for dynamic behavior.
tasks.testStrategy: Test member recruitment, role assignment, and relationship dynamics under various scenarios.

tasks.title: Develop Social Interaction System
tasks.description: Implement a system for managing social interactions and relationships.
tasks.details: Create the IntimacySystem interface to manage relationships and social actions. Implement triggers for relationship events.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate social interactions to test relationship dynamics and event triggering.

tasks.title: Design Recruitment System
tasks.description: Develop a recruitment system for guild members, including legendary members.
tasks.details: Implement the RecruitmentSystem interface with filters for member search and negotiation processes. Integrate legendary member recruitment features.
tasks.testStrategy: Test recruitment processes for different member types, ensuring correct filtering and negotiation outcomes.

tasks.title: Create Combat Simulation System
tasks.description: Develop a system for simulating combat outcomes in PVE and PVP.
tasks.details: Implement the CombatSimulation interface to calculate combat results based on member attributes, tactics, and random factors.
tasks.testStrategy: Run combat simulations to validate result accuracy and balance.

tasks.title: Implement DLC and Plugin Support
tasks.description: Add support for DLC and plugins to extend game content.
tasks.details: Design a modular system to load and manage additional content through DLCs and plugins. Ensure compatibility with core systems.
tasks.testStrategy: Test DLC and plugin integration to ensure seamless content addition and removal.

tasks.title: Develop User Experience Enhancements
tasks.description: Improve user experience with tutorials and data visualization.
tasks.details: Implement tutorials for new players and enhance data visualization for better decision-making. Focus on reducing learning curve.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct user testing to evaluate tutorial effectiveness and data visualization clarity.

tasks.title: Create Media and Community Interaction System
tasks.description: Develop systems for media and community interactions.
tasks.details: Implement systems for media feedback and community discussions. Integrate with the event system for dynamic interactions.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate media and community events to test interaction dynamics and impact on guild reputation.

tasks.title: Design Achievement and Reward System
tasks.description: Implement a system for achievements and rewards to enhance player engagement.
tasks.details: Create a system to track player achievements and distribute rewards. Integrate with core gameplay systems for seamless operation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test achievement tracking and reward distribution to ensure accurate recognition and incentive delivery.

tasks.title: Define World Generation System Interface
tasks.description: Create the interface for the world generation system to dynamically generate different competitive environments.
tasks.details: Define the WorldGenerationSystem interface with methods for generating competitors and initializing world state. Implement the guildArchetypes property to hold predefined NPC guild archetypes.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit test the interface methods to ensure they return expected types and handle edge cases.

tasks.title: Implement NPC Guild Archetype Interface
tasks.description: Develop the NPCGuildArchetype interface to define the structure of NPC guilds.
tasks.details: Implement properties such as id, name, tier, reputation, strategy, initialMembers, initialOfficers, specialties, personality, feud, homebase, legendaryMembers, historyMilestones, leagueSchedule, and diplomaticAttitude.
tasks.testStrategy: Create mock data and validate that all properties are correctly initialized and accessible.

tasks.title: Develop History Milestone System
tasks.description: Create the GuildHistoryRecord interface to track historical milestones of guilds.
tasks.details: Define properties like id, eventType, eventTitle, eventDescription, achievementDate, significance, relatedData, and impactAssessment.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the creation and retrieval of history records, ensuring data integrity and correct impact calculations.

tasks.title: Create Historical Ranking System
tasks.description: Implement the HistoricalRanking interface to manage guild ranking history.
tasks.details: Include properties for highestServerRank, highestBattlezoneRank, highestNationalRank, highestGlobalRank, rankingTimeline, rankingAchievements, and rivalryRecords.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate ranking changes and verify that the timeline and achievements are updated correctly.

tasks.title: Design Guild League Schedule System
tasks.description: Develop the GuildLeagueSchedule interface to manage guild competition schedules.
tasks.details: Implement properties for seasonId, seasonName, scheduleType, upcomingMatches, completedMatches, seasonInfo, and seasonStats.
tasks.testStrategy: Test schedule creation and updates, ensuring matches are correctly categorized and season stats are accurate.

tasks.title: Implement Diplomatic Attitude System
tasks.description: Create the DiplomaticAttitude interface to handle guild diplomatic relations.
tasks.details: Define properties such as attitudeValue, attitudeCategory, stabilityFactor, attitudeFactors, adjustmentTriggers, decayRate, and lastUpdateTime.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate attitude changes over time and in response to triggers, ensuring stability and decay rates are applied correctly.

tasks.title: Develop Diplomatic Event Pool
tasks.description: Implement the DiplomaticEventPool interface to manage diplomatic events.
tasks.details: Include properties for poolId, applicableAttitudeRange, eventsByType, eventWeights, and triggerConditions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test event triggering based on attitude range and weights, ensuring correct event selection and execution.

tasks.title: Create Player Guild System
tasks.description: Extend the BaseGuild interface to define the PlayerGuild structure.
tasks.details: Implement properties for id, name, tag, realm, faction, guildLevel, reputation, experience, leader, foundedDate, motto, description, members, guildHall, guildBank, facilities, resources, raidProgress, pvpRating, achievements, officerSystem, guildPolicies, recruitmentSettings, alliances, rivalries, reputation_external, treasury, taxSettings, and budgetAllocation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the integration of player-specific features and ensure compatibility with NPC guild systems.

tasks.title: Develop Guild Roster System
tasks.description: Implement the GuildRoster interface to manage guild members.
tasks.details: Define properties for totalMembers, onlineMembers, membersByRank, membersByClass, membersByLevel, membersByRarity, legendaryMembers, legendaryMemberCount, membersByLegendaryType, sortOptions, filterOptions, memberNotes, officerNotes, legendaryShowcase, and legendaryMemberHighlights.
tasks.testStrategy: Test member management functions, including sorting, filtering, and legendary member features.

tasks.title: Implement Legendary Highlight System
tasks.description: Create the LegendaryHighlight interface to manage special member highlights.
tasks.details: Define properties for memberId, highlightType, specialBadge, glowEffect, and customNote.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the application of highlights to members and ensure visual effects are correctly displayed.

tasks.title: Develop Guild Rank System
tasks.description: Implement the GuildRank enum to define guild ranks.
tasks.details: Define ranks such as GUILD_MASTER, OFFICER, VETERAN, MEMBER, INITIATE, and TRIAL.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure ranks are correctly assigned and managed within the guild system.

tasks.title: Integrate World Generation with Player Guilds
tasks.description: Connect the world generation system with player guild functionalities.
tasks.details: Ensure that player guilds are correctly integrated into the dynamic world generation process, allowing for interaction with NPC guilds.
tasks.testStrategy: Test world generation scenarios to ensure player guilds are correctly initialized and interact with NPC guilds as expected.

tasks.title: Implement Guild Base Core System
tasks.description: Develop the core system for managing the guild base, including guild hall, base level, and facilities.
tasks.details: Create the GuildBase interface and implement methods to manage guild hall, base level, and facilities. Ensure the system can handle upgrades and constructions with proper resource management.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for each method to ensure correct handling of guild base operations and resource management.

tasks.title: Develop Facility Management System
tasks.description: Create a system to manage guild facilities, including construction, upgrades, and demolitions.
tasks.details: Implement the FacilityManager class with methods for building, upgrading, and demolishing facilities. Include logic for calculating bonuses and managing upgrade queues.
tasks.testStrategy: Test facility operations with various scenarios to ensure correct behavior and resource calculations.

tasks.title: Implement Facility Upgrade Requirements
tasks.description: Develop the logic to handle facility upgrade requirements based on guild level, experience, and dependencies.
tasks.details: Create the UpgradeRequirement interface and implement methods to check and validate upgrade conditions. Ensure dependencies are correctly handled.
tasks.testStrategy: Test upgrade scenarios with different requirement types to ensure correct validation and error handling.

tasks.title: Design NPC Member Contribution System
tasks.description: Develop a system to track and manage NPC member contributions within the guild.
tasks.details: Implement the NPCMemberContributionSystem interface with methods for tracking activities, calculating contributions, and managing rewards. Include analytics for contribution efficiency.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate contribution tracking and reward management through integration tests with simulated NPC activities.

tasks.title: Create Auction House System
tasks.description: Develop the auction house system for player and AI interactions, including bidding and item management.
tasks.details: Implement the AuctionHouseSystem interface with methods for creating, managing, and concluding auctions. Include AI purchase logic and price evaluation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test auction scenarios with player and AI interactions to ensure correct bidding and item management.

tasks.title: Develop Training System
tasks.description: Implement the training system to manage training programs, schedules, and results for guild members.
tasks.details: Create the TrainingSystem interface with methods for scheduling, executing, and evaluating training programs. Include logic for calculating training effects and managing fatigue.
tasks.testStrategy: Test training program execution and result calculation with various configurations to ensure correct outcomes.

tasks.title: Implement Fatigue Management System
tasks.description: Develop a system to manage member fatigue and recovery plans within the guild.
tasks.details: Implement the FatigueManagementSystem interface with methods for tracking fatigue, executing recovery plans, and calculating facility influences.
tasks.testStrategy: Test fatigue tracking and recovery scenarios to ensure correct fatigue reduction and resource management.

tasks.title: Develop Intelligent Mail System
tasks.description: Create a system for intelligent mail categorization and quick actions based on game events.
tasks.details: Implement the IntelligentMailSystem interface with methods for categorizing emails, generating quick actions, and managing notifications.
tasks.testStrategy: Test mail categorization and quick action generation with various event scenarios to ensure correct classification and action availability.

tasks.title: Design Event-Driven Mail Generation System
tasks.description: Implement a system to automatically generate emails based on game events and user preferences.
tasks.details: Create the EventMailGenerator interface with methods for generating event-based emails and customizing content based on user preferences.
tasks.testStrategy: Test email generation with different event types to ensure correct content and quick action recommendations.

tasks.title: Implement Advanced Filter and Search System
tasks.description: Develop a system for advanced filtering and searching of emails within the guild communication module.
tasks.details: Implement the AdvancedFilterSystem interface with methods for filtering emails by various criteria and performing intelligent searches.
tasks.testStrategy: Test filtering and search functionalities with different criteria to ensure accurate results and performance.

tasks.title: Design Responsive User Interface
tasks.description: Create a responsive UI that adapts to different screen sizes, supports keyboard navigation, and is optimized for performance.
tasks.details: Implement a responsive layout using CSS Flexbox or Grid. Ensure all interactive elements are accessible via keyboard and screen readers. Optimize rendering for large datasets using virtual scrolling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test on various devices and screen sizes. Use accessibility tools to verify keyboard navigation and screen reader support. Measure performance with large datasets.

tasks.title: Implement Core UI Components
tasks.description: Develop the main navigation, side panel, content area, and modal system as per the UI specifications.
tasks.details: Create reusable components for NavigationBar, InformationPanel, ContentArea, and ModalManager. Use a component-based framework like React or Vue.js.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit test each component for functionality. Conduct integration tests to ensure components work together seamlessly.

tasks.title: Develop Interaction Patterns
tasks.description: Implement drag-and-drop, right-click menus, keyboard shortcuts, and tooltip systems.
tasks.details: Use libraries like React DnD for drag-and-drop, and implement context menus using custom event handlers. Define keyboard shortcuts and tooltips using a centralized configuration.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each interaction pattern individually. Use user testing to ensure intuitive interactions.

tasks.title: Design Achievement System
tasks.description: Create a multi-dimensional achievement system with event-driven triggers and a reward mechanism.
tasks.details: Define the AchievementDefinition interface and implement the AchievementManager class. Use an event listener to trigger achievements based on game events.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate game events to verify achievement triggers. Ensure rewards are correctly allocated and displayed.

tasks.title: Integrate Fan Expectations with Achievements
tasks.description: Link achievement completion to fan satisfaction and expectations.
tasks.details: Modify the AchievementDefinition to include fanImpact. Update the fan system to adjust satisfaction based on achievements.
tasks.testStrategy: Test fan satisfaction changes upon achievement completion. Validate the impact on fan metrics.

tasks.title: Implement Experience System
tasks.description: Develop a simplified experience system focusing on member growth and activity specialization.
tasks.details: Create the MemberExperienceSystem interface and implement experience calculations in the ExperienceManager class. Focus on level progression and activity-specific experience.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify experience calculations and level-ups. Test activity-specific experience impacts on performance.

tasks.title: Develop Guild Reputation System
tasks.description: Replace guild experience with a reputation system linked to achievements and activities.
tasks.details: Implement the GuildReputationSystem interface. Track reputation sources and calculate bonuses based on achievements and activities.
tasks.testStrategy: Test reputation changes with various activities and achievements. Ensure bonuses are correctly applied.

tasks.title: Create Activity Feedback System
tasks.description: Provide AI-driven feedback after PVE and PVP activities, with personalized evaluations.
tasks.details: Implement the ActivityFeedbackSystem interface. Use AI to generate feedback based on activity performance and evaluator profiles.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate activities to test feedback generation. Ensure feedback is relevant and personalized.

tasks.title: Design Officer System

tasks.title: Implement Simplified Officer Interface

tasks.testStrategy: Test AI system performance and accuracy in decision-making. Validate NLP processing with varied inputs.

tasks.title: Conduct System Integration Testing
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive testing of all integrated systems to ensure seamless functionality.
tasks.details: Conduct end-to-end testing of all systems, including UI, achievement, experience, reputation, feedback, and officer systems.

tasks.title: Validate System Integration and Performance
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive testing to ensure all components of the World Boss System work together seamlessly and perform well under load.
tasks.details: Perform load testing and integration testing across all system components to ensure stability and performance during high player participation.

tasks.title: Setup Godot Engine and Project Configuration
tasks.description: Initialize the development environment using Godot 4.5 and establish project configurations.
tasks.details:
1. Install Godot 4.5 and set up the development environment.
2. Configure C# project settings and establish coding standards.
3. Implement signal and Autoload communication mechanisms.
4. Define the basic project structure and module division.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify environment setup by running a sample Godot project. Ensure signals and Autoload mechanisms work as expected.

tasks.title: Design and Implement Event System Core
tasks.description: Develop the core components of the event system including interfaces and management.
tasks.details:
1. Design and implement the EventDefinition interface.
2. Develop the event pool manager to handle event storage and retrieval.
3. Implement basic trigger mechanisms for events.
4. Validate the simple event processing workflow.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct unit tests on event triggering and processing using xUnit. Ensure 90%+ code coverage.

tasks.title: Develop Data Architecture and State Management
tasks.description: Create the data structures and state management systems needed for the game.
tasks.details:
